notesStmt.note: Imperfect at the end. One leaf missing after folio 100. Several folios stained.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The commentary of Daṿid ben Bo῾az on the book of Exodus (fragments).

collation.p: 11 quires of 10 leaves each. Imperfect at the end. Quires signed with Arabic words on the upper margin of the first page.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: A Naskhi hand of the 13th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house, marbled cover. Spine: 'Comm. on Exodus. Arabic. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2403.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), an antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Library from him on 23 July 1881, folio [109v].
